Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DynamicFields xmlns="T1.CoreLib.Compatibility.ValueObjects" /> <ExplicitKey xmlns="T1.CoreLib.Compatibility.ValueObjects">91eb0f30-e9d9-487a-926a-480dec622404</ExplicitKey> <InputTableName>AFRG_B_NATACCT_RAW</InputTableName> <Columns> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>2a53d913-2f3f-4e76-81dd-55034cd85e81</DefKey> <ColumnName>RPT_SECTION</ColumnName> <ColumnType></ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>ToNumber(Left([RPT_SUM], 2))</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> </Columns> <Lookups /> <AddKeyColumn>false</AddKeyColumn> <KeyColumnName></KeyColumnName> </StorageObject>

Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DynamicFields xmlns="T1.CoreLib.Compatibility.ValueObjects" /> <ExplicitKey xmlns="T1.CoreLib.Compatibility.ValueObjects">463c1953-1fa8-4506-8c57-7c2cff8d69c0</ExplicitKey> <InputTableName>AFRG_B_NATACCT_RAW</InputTableName> <Columns> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>2566c6b3-f337-40af-b279-2a31536b9d73</DefKey> <ColumnName>RPT_SECTION</ColumnName> <ColumnType></ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>30</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <ValueNotFoundOption>D</ValueNotFoundOption> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> </Columns> <Lookups /> <FilterCriteria> <DefKey>08a11257-b646-4f06-8bd0-106c121bfbb1</DefKey> <CriteriaValues> <CriteriaValue> <DefKey>d73fcdcb-7006-4945-9f91-d24c365be7ab</DefKey> <ColumnPrefix IsAssigned="false" /> <ColumnId>RPT_SECTION</ColumnId> <Operator> <Value>GreaterThan</Value> <IsAssigned>true</IsAssigned> <IsNull>false</IsNull> </Operator> <MetaOperatorText IsAssigned="false" /> <Value1>30</Value1> <Value2></Value2> <CriteriaValue1ColumnId IsAssigned="false" /> <CriteriaValue2ColumnId IsAssigned="false" /> <Link>AND</Link> </CriteriaValue> </CriteriaValues> <SetName IsAssigned="false" /> <Link>AND</Link> <NestedSets /> </FilterCriteria> </StorageObject>
Step.Name: Update Columns

Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DynamicFields xmlns="T1.CoreLib.Compatibility.ValueObjects" /> <DefKey>4891d562-e47e-40f6-81d2-37ce4ed3ce27</DefKey> <InputTableName>AFRG_B_NATACCT_RAW</InputTableName> <Columns> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>c3a9435f-54cd-478d-b995-c9450ef3cc3f</DefKey> <ColumnName>RPT_SECTION_DESC</ColumnName> <ColumnType></ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>IIF([RPT_SECTION]=10, 'Operating Income', IIF([RPT_SECTION]=20, 'Operating Expenditure', IIF([RPT_SECTION]=25, 'Net Contribution', IIF([RPT_SECTION]=30, 'Non Operating Income and Expenditure', ''))))</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> </Columns> <Lookups /> <AddKeyColumn>false</AddKeyColumn> <KeyColumnName></KeyColumnName> </StorageObject>
